name: Halfling
description: Halflings are small, nimble, and cheerful folk who are known for their love of peace, food, and community. They are naturally stealthy and surprisingly brave for their size. Halflings live in pastoral regions and are typically content with a quiet, simple life, though many are also curious and eager for adventure.
languages: You can speak, read, and write Common and Halfling.
special: Lucky: When you roll a 1 on the d20 for an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.
